title: His One And Only
description: The moment former art teacher Drew Richards spots gorgeous African-American lawyer Mark Stevens at a party, he is intrigued. Though rebuffed at first, a persistent Drew convinces Mark they can be friends at least.After the death of his partner, Mark buried himself in work, a habit he can’t seem to break...until he meets Drew. The short, dark-haired Drew is not Mark’s usual sort, but he finds the man way too appealing, and before he knows it, he and Drew become more than friends.Since Mark’s been out of the dating scene for a long while, he can’t help but make a few missteps in their growing relationship. But Drew is looking for a serious commitment. Can he become Mark’s one and only? Gay / Contemporary / Interracial / Series
author: Shawn Lane
